definitions.definition: To fill spaces in a line of type with quads. Also quad out .
To align text with the left or right margin, or centre it.
definitions.label_groups: typography , phototypesetting and digital typesetting , transitive , intransitive

definitions.definition: To twist four individually insulated conductors together as two pairs of twisted wires that are then twisted together.

main_definition: ( typography , letterpress typography , transitive , intransitive ) To fill spaces in a line of type with quads. Also quad out .
secondary_definitions: ( typography , phototypesetting and digital typesetting , transitive , intransitive ) To align text with the left or right margin, or centre it.
( transitive ) To twist four individually insulated conductors together as two pairs of twisted wires that are then twisted together.
( intransitive ) To ride a quad bike .
